backgammon.game

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • backgammon.game.Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Point. represents the point on a backgammon board contains pieces Used by the board 24 times to create the board state
    Author:
    David Lomas - 11035527
